properties.name: Bay Street
properties.address: Pine St between Bloomfield & Glenridge Aves, Montclair, NJ
properties.parking: Municipal lot; bike room in garage
properties.notes: Rebuilt 2002; Transit Village 2010; weekend service terminus

properties.name: Walnut Street
properties.address: Walnut St at Depot Square, Montclair, NJ
properties.notes: Busiest station on line; built 1952; near Erie Park

properties.name: Watchung Avenue
properties.address: Park St at Watchung Plaza, Montclair, NJ
properties.parking: Fairfield St lot; limited bike racks
properties.notes: Historic station house; weekday service only

properties.name: Mountain Avenue
properties.address: Upper Mountain Ave at Glenwood Pl, Montclair, NJ

properties.name: Bay Street Station
properties.notes: Primary Montclair NJT rail terminal; major transfer and park-and-ride

properties.name: Walnut Street Station and shopping district
properties.notes: Neighborhood main street node; station adjacent to Walnut St business district

properties.name: Watchung Plaza and Train Station
properties.notes: Watchung Plaza commercial district and station area

properties.name: Upper Montclair Station
properties.notes: Station immediately next to Upper Montclair business district

properties.name: Upper Montclair Station and Business District (Valley Rd & Bellevue Ave)
properties.notes: Valley & Bellevue commercial core; key transit transfer node. Coordinates approximate via Upper Montclair Station.

properties.name: Montclair Heights Station
properties.notes: Serves northern Montclair & Montclair State University campus (south end)
